title: toLaladiru
sahitya:
toLaladiru kaNDa kaDege paramAtmanoLa goNDu sakhiso manavE


caraNam 1    lipiyoLaghiLava cintisi kaDe kaDege kapiyante eDeyADade manavE 
gupitadoLagiddAtmana dhyAnisalu aparimita sukha sukhisuve manavE
    caraNam 2   nAga nara suralOka tiru tirugi kAgeyenteDeyADade manavE
rAga dvESa tolagisi manadi madhusUdanana kANu kaNDya manavE
    caraNam 3    pararigida sUcisadiro siddhAnta parama tatvavanu tiLidu manave 
guru purandara viTTalana smarisalu sthiravulLa mukutiyahudo manavE
